about_the_game:
Enhance your Subverse experience by grabbing this free 4K Cinematics pack!Enjoy high-resolution, ultra crisp cutscenes as StudioFOW intended them to be enjoyed. This DLC provides 4K copies of the cinematics included with the base game.

Please make sure the "4K Videos" option is ticked in the Graphics Settings menu of the game.

NOTE: Requires an additional 31GB of hard drive space on top of the base game installation.

content_descriptors.notes: The 4KMovies DLC displays explicit adult content. The cutscenes in this DLC are the 4K version of the already delivered lower resolution files. If such public displays of chode voyeurism are offensive to you, please avoid this DLC.
